meanings.definition: An infectious viral disease affecting the central nervous system and sometimes leading to paralysis.
meanings.sent1: Polio can cause paralysis in some people.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are working hard to eradicate polio worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The polio virus decided to take a vacation in the nervous system.
meanings.sent4: The spread of misinformation is like a silent polio creeping into society.
meanings.sent5: The effects of polio on the nervous system are devastating.

meanings.definition: A vaccine used to prevent polio.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to get the polio vaccine to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: The polio vaccine has saved countless lives.
meanings.sent3: The polio vaccine high-fived the immune system for its hard work.
meanings.sent4: The polio vaccine is a shield against a dangerous enemy.
meanings.sent5: Getting the polio vaccine is a smart choice for everyone.
